description: It has been said that a back tattoo is like a storybook – a permanent record of the wearer's life and experiences. While this may be true, it is important to remember that a back tattoo is also a highly visible and public statement. As such, it is important to choose a design and placement that is both meaningful and appropriate. While tattoos on the back can be quite beautiful, they can also be quite dangerous.
name: Back Tattoos
